contents.item: When your intuition is strong, follow it.
contents.owner: Lolly Daskal, The Leadership Gap: What Gets Between You and Your Greatness

contents.item: Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: Be brave to stand for what you believe in even if you stand alone.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: You don’t have to like someone, but you have to treat them as you wish to be treated.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: How much you can learn when you fail determines how far you will go into achieving your goals.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: If you care about someone enough, you’ll always be there for them no matter what.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett

contents.item: Change may not always bring growth, but there is no growth without change.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: Do good, live in the most positive and joyful way possible every day.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: Focus on your goals, not your fear. Focus like a laser beam on your goals.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: Whatever the clouds plan to do I always trust in the sun which never fails to come out
contents.owner: Munia Khan

contents.item: You can have everything you want if you can put your heart and soul into everything you do.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett

contents.item: No one has ever achieved greatness without dreams.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: If your dreams are to hard to achieve, just achieve
contents.owner: Benny Bellamacina, Piddly Poems for Children, v.2

contents.item: Be where you are, stop over-thinking, and focus on what you are doing.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: Stop doing what is easy or popular. Start doing what is right.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: To shine your brightest light is to be who you truly are.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett

contents.item: Guard well your thoughts when alone and your words when accompanied.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett

contents.item: The rain begins with a single drop
contents.owner: Manal Al-Sharif, Daring to Drive: A Saudi Woman’s Awakening

contents.item: Do not fear failure but rather fear not trying.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: Whatever choice you make makes you. Choose wisely.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett

contents.item: Be the positive impact on the lives of others.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett

contents.item: When you lose your smile, you lose your way in the chaos of life.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett

contents.item: Do not let arrogance go to your head and despair to your heart.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett

contents.item: Life becomes easier and more beautiful when we can see the good in other people.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett

contents.item: It takes sunshine and rain to make a rainbow. There would be no rainbows without sunshine and rain.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: Dream your own dreams, achieve your own goals. Your journey is your own and unique.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: Nothing can disturb your peace of mind unless you allow it to.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: Greatness means setting out to make some difference somewhere to someone in someplace.
contents.owner: Lolly Daskal, The Leadership Gap: What Gets Between You and Your Greatness

contents.item: Maturity is when you stop complaining and making excuses, and start making changes.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: Listen with curiosity. Speak with honesty. Act with integrity.
contents.owner: Roy  Bennett

contents.item: Don’t waste your time in anger, regrets, worries, and grudges. Life is too short to be unhappy.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett

contents.item: You were born to stand out, stop trying to fit in.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: What helps you persevere is your resilience and commitment.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: To overcome fear is the quickest way to gain your self-confidence.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: Be the positive impact on someone’s life.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett

contents.item: You cannot control the behavior of others, but you can always choose how you respond to it.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: You are not rich until you have a rich heart.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: To have what you have never had, you have to do what you have never done.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: Seeing the mud around a lotus is pessimism, seeing a lotus in the mud is optimism.
contents.owner: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

contents.item: Focus on how far you have come in liferather than looking at the accomplishments of others.
contents.owner: Lolly Daskal, The Leadership Gap: What Gets Between You and Your Greatness

contents.item: Intuition is a sense of knowing how to act decisively without needing to know why.
contents.owner: Lolly Daskal, The Leadership Gap: What Gets Between You and Your Greatness

contents.item: Sometimes you have to lose all you have to find out who you truly are.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: Learning to focus on the big picture will help you keep things in a proper perspective.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett

contents.item: Keep your promises and be consistent. Be the kind of person others can trust.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett

contents.item: Good people see the good and bring out the best in other people.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: People are successful because they think and act like successful people.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: Integrity is doing what is right and truthful, and doing as you say you would do.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: Be with someone who inspires you and makes you be the best version of yourself.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett

contents.item: Let go of something old that no longer serves you in order to make room for something new.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: If you believe very strongly in something, stand up and fight for it.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: There is nothing so convincing as a thing well done.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett

contents.item: Be positive. Be true. Be kind.
contents.owner: Roy  Bennett

contents.item: When you take control of your attitude, you take control of your life.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: If you care about something enough, you'll find a way to make it happen.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett

contents.item: Instead of worrying about what you cannot control, shift your energy to what you can create.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: It takes guts and humility to admit mistakes. Admitting we're wrong is courage, not weakness.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: Those who win never give up.Those who give up never win.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett

contents.item: Make improvements, not excuses. Seek respect, not attention.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: Do what you love, love what you do, and with all your heart give yourself to it.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: Integrity is doing the right thing when nobody's watching, and doing as you say you would do.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: Let the improvement of yourself keep you so busy that you have no time to criticize others.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: Discipline your mind to see the good in every situation and look on the best side of every event.
contents.owner: Roy  Bennett

contents.item: You will never follow your own inner voice until you clear up the doubts in your mind.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett

contents.item: Always have a willing hand to help someone, you might be the only one that does.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: Self-assurance reassures others and reassures yourself.
contents.owner: Lolly Daskal, The Leadership Gap: What Gets Between You and Your Greatness

contents.item: Becoming a great leader doesn’t mean being perfect. it means living with your imperfections.
contents.owner: Lolly Daskal, The Leadership Gap: What Gets Between You and Your Greatness

contents.item: We are all different. Don’t judge, understand instead.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: Most of us must learn to love people and use things rather than loving things and using people.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: Failure is a bend in the road, not the end of the road. Learn from failure and keep moving forward.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett

contents.item: Do what is right, not what is easy nor what is popular.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: Do not allow your inner doubts to keep you from achieving what you can do.
contents.owner: Lolly Daskal, The Leadership Gap: What Gets Between You and Your Greatness

contents.item: Don’t blame others. it won’t make you a better person.
contents.owner: Lolly Daskal, The Leadership Gap: What Gets Between You and Your Greatness

contents.item: Believe in your infinite potential. Your only limitations are those you set upon yourself.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: Stay strong, stay positive, and never give up.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: Life teaches us the right path is rarely the easy one.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: Gratitude builds a bridge to abundance.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: Too many people are too busy making a living to make a life.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett

contents.item: Beliefs are choices. First you choose your beliefs. Then your beliefs affect your choices.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett

contents.item: To learn something new, you need to try new things and not be afraid to be wrong.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett

contents.item: Consistency is the true foundation of trust. Either keep your promises or do not make them.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett

contents.item: Life is short. Focus on what really matters most. You have to change your priorities over time.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: Good things happen in your life when you surround yourself with positive people.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: Life is too short to waste your time on people who don’t respect, appreciate, and value you.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: Turn obstacles into opportunities and problems into possibilities.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: Follow your heart, listen to your inner voice, stop caring about what others think.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: You have two choices, to conquer your fear or to let your fear conquer you.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: If you don’t give up on something you truly believe in, you will find a way.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett

contents.item: Stop doing what is easy. Start doing what is right.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: Instead of worrying about what you cannot control, focus your energy on what you can create.
contents.owner: Roy  Bennett
